name: ProCreate
description:
• Tend to animals (by giving water/food)
  • Breed animals 
  • Sell animal products so you can buy more things (using shear) 
Controls Player1:

Keyboard

  • Movement: WASD
  • Interaction: Space
  • Cancel:  Left Shift
  • Pause: escape

Controller

  • Movement: Left joystick
    • Xbox: 
      • Interaction: A
      • Cancel: B
    • PS4: 
      • Interaction: Triangle
      • Cancel: Circle
    • DualShock:
      • Interaction: Square
      • Cancel: X (Cross)
Player2:

Keyboard

  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Interaction: .
  • Cancel: ,

Controller

  • Movement: Left joystick
  • Xbox: 
    • Interaction: A
    • Cancel: B
  • PS4: 
    • Interaction: Triangle
    • Cancel: Circle
  • DualShock:
    • Interaction: Square
    • Cancel: X (Cross)
